Method.name: OnPageHEAD
Method.Implementation: Write "<head>" Write !,"<title>Система складского учёта</title>",! Write "<link href=""style.css"" type=text/css rel=stylesheet>" Write !,"<style>" Write !,"TD{font-family:'Arial';font-size:13pt;}",! Write "</style>" Write !,"<script language=""javascript"">" Write !,"function startFun(){",! Write "window.returnValue=maintext.value;",! Write "window.close();",! Write "}",! Write !,"function windowclose(){",! Write "if(window.confirm(""Закрыть окно без сохранения изменений?"")){",! Write "window.close() ",! Write "}",! Write "}",! Write !,"function load(){",! Write "if(window.dialogArguments!=""""){",! Write " maintext.value=window.dialogArguments;",! Write "}",! Write "}",! Write "</script>" Write !,"</head>"

Method.name: OnPageHTML
Method.Implementation: Write "<html>" Write ! Do ..OnPageHEAD() Write ! Do ..OnPageBODY() Write !,"</html>"
